item.title: Learning to Learn: Python
item.description: Python is a relatively simple language compared to others such as C++. Despite its simplicity, Python really shines because of its robust standard library, extensive 3rd party library ecosystem (especially for statistics and data analysis), and intuitiveness. This post tracks my process of learning how to program well in Python. Order of Topics The listing of topics here is arbitrary and represents the path that I took to learn Python roughly organized by topic.
